title: Love Like Arsenic - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Cruel Characters   Death of Loved Ones   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Sibling Rivalry
author: Wang Peipei   王培培
description: I didn’t believe that truth would come to light sooner or later before, until I found myself being manipulated and insulted by that man. I gradually lost myself as I fell into the trap set by him. He pinched my face and whispered, “Are you aware of how slutty you are, Lin Feng?” To die, or to live? Shall I live or shall he die!>
